document_data.caption: The location of the Road of Jackals in the Scimitar Spires.
document_data.name: Road of Jackals
document_data.refs: {{cite book/Anauroch|54}}{{cite book/Forgotten Realms Campaign Setting 3rd edition|99}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''Road of Jackals''' was a pass through the [[Scimitar Spires]], known to the ancient [[Netherese]] as Humaithira.
document_data.Geography: The Road was one of two passes that cut through the Scimitar Spires, along with the [[Gap of Skulls]]. It was located towards the southern end of the Scimitar Spires, and could shorten a journey past the mountains by at least a hundred miles.
